quotes.message: Revenge is a kind of wild justice, which the more man's nature runs to the more ought law to weed it out.
quotes.name: Francis Bacon

quotes.message: Revenge and retaliation always pertuate the cycle of anger, fear and violence.
quotes.name: Coretta Scott King

quotes.message: Revenge is an act of passion; vengeance of justice. Injuries are revenged; crimes are avenged.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Retaliation is as just as night and down.
quotes.name: Lone Wolf

quotes.message: Revenge is a sorrow for the person who has to take it on. And the person who is rash enough to think it's going to help a situation is always wrong.
quotes.name: Louise Erdrich

quotes.message: Retaliation by rebellion is hurtful to the intended target, but sadly it creates a heated desert that demands for the now rebel to reach out his arms of pride for help, a few succumb the courage to do it, many die because their arms are heavy.
quotes.name: Fort Free

quotes.message: Revenge is the infliction of pain, in consequence of the neglect or violation of duty.
quotes.name: Elhanan Winchester

quotes.message: Our capacity to retaliate must be, and is, massive in order to deter all forms of aggression.
quotes.name: John Foster Dulles

quotes.message: Revenge is a particularly interesting concept, especially the notion of whether or not it exists outside of just an abstract idea.
quotes.name: Christopher Nolan

quotes.message: Retaliation is related to nature and instinct, not to law. Law, by definition, cannot obey the same rules as nature.
quotes.name: Albert Camus

quotes.message: He who wrongs someone has to expect something in retaliation.
quotes.name: Anonymous

quotes.message: Revenge is like politics, one thing always leads to another until bad has become worse, and worse has become worst.
quotes.name: Jonas Jonasson

quotes.message: Revenge can only be found on the road to self-destruction.
quotes.name: Wayne Gerard Trotman

quotes.message: Revenge has no more quenching effect on emotions than salt water has on thirst.
quotes.name: Walter Weckler

quotes.message: The will to survive is not as important as the will to prevail the answer to criminal aggression is retaliation.
quotes.name: Jeff Cooper

quotes.message: Revenge is backward looking, whereas rationality is forward looking so the two fail to engage.
quotes.name: Alan Hamlin

quotes.message: Without forgiveness life is governed by an endless cycle of resentment and retaliation.
quotes.name: Roberto Assagioli

quotes.message: Revenge is the act of passion, vengeance is an act of justice.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Revenge is an infection of the spirit.
quotes.name: Jonathan Maberry

quotes.message: The best revenge is to live on and prove yourself.
quotes.name: Eddie Vedder

quotes.message: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.name: Frank Sinatra

quotes.message: Revenge is always the weak pleasure of a little and narrow mind.
quotes.name: Juvenal

quotes.message: Revenge is a confession of pain.
quotes.name: Anonymous
